# The Warlocks (EP)

| length     = 34:37
| label      = Bomp!
| producer   = Naut Human, David Deresinksi
| prev_title =
| prev_year  =
| next_title = Rise and Fall
| next_year  = 2001
}}
The Warlocks is the debut EP by American neo-psychedelic rock band the Warlocks, released in 2000 by record label Bomp!.
Reception
AllMusic called the EP "wholly brilliant".
Track listing
#"Cocaine Blues"
#"Song for Nico"
#"Jam of the Zombies"
#"Caveman Rock"
#"Angry Demons"
#"Jam of the Warlocks"
